summary: The worker binary ID should be determined by the workflow bundle checksum rather than just the SDK version, to ensure consistent identification across deployments with the same code.
userImpact: Workers may be incorrectly identified across deployments, making it difficult to track and manage workflow execution in production environments.
rootCause: SDK version alone is insufficient as a binary ID; it doesn't reflect actual code changes and won't be consistent across deployments with identical code.
proposedFix: Use SHA sum of the workflow bundle combined with SDK version as the binary ID, ensuring consistency across deployments while accounting for code changes.
resolutionDetails: Implemented using SHA sum of the workflow bundle and SDK version as the binary ID, as documented in the worker.ts source code.
keyQuote: I think what we do now is good enough (using sha sum of the workflow bundle and SDK version).
